description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Herman is a unique action scroller with 25 long levels, 5 difficulty levels and hours of gameplay.  Herman is in the midst of a midlife crisis, and you must help him escape from work.  The game has a brilliant story (told in over 200 beautiful backgrounds), 15 professional music tracks, many different enemies and a nice mix of upgrades, including Herman's lucky fedora!  VERY challenging and fun.
